attributes.action: get Ian Brady to own up where Keith Bennett is buried on Saddleworth Moores.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The waiting for Winnie Johnson can not go any longer.Her son's body must be found to put her mind at rest.45 years is too long .She only wants to do the right thing for Keith and thats give him a decent burial.
All those that are parents wouldnt want to be like Winnie and wait this long.Find Keiths body now.Winnie has rights too.All she wants is justice

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
